title: "Medorion Expands AI-Powered Electronic Behavioral Records Platform"
excerpt: "Medorion has announced that it will broaden it’s AI-powered EBR (Electronic Behavioral Records) platform. The company develops Behavioral Intelligence SaaS solutions for health insurers, and the new expansion will focus on additional health plan-related focus areas beyond the company’s current Behavioral Persuasion software."
